articles.description: Ohioans 65 and older have needed lots of patience, determination and free time to navigate the state’s COVID-19 vaccine rollout. Demand has outstripped supplies at pharmacies and hospitals, forcing some people to drive hours away to find the shot – if they ca…
articles.content:
CLEVELAND, Ohio Sharon Rosche was on a mission to get the COVID-19 vaccine for her 87-year-old father.
For 10 days Roche, 54, endured two-hour waits on the Giant Eagle website just to be allowed int… [+7547 chars]
